thread.title: Second trip here
thread.title_full: Second trip here - Review of Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: FLNYtraveller
title: Second trip here
text: Stayed here a year ago and reluctantly came back because I needed to be in the area. Much improved and a much better stay this time around. The staff bent over backwards to accommodate me, upgrading me to a larger room and I was provided with a personalized note from the GM upon entering my room. The team in the 4th floor lounge, including Chaylene and Arianna are amazing and took great care of us. Overall the hotel was well maintained and very clean. I will definitely be back.
